title: The Horse Master of Shanhasson
description: Romance, Fantasy, BDSM Prequel to The Shanhasson Trilogy After working in Her Majesty’s stables for five years, Jake is called into the palace under a veil of secrecy. The High Queen is ready to abdicate, and he’s her last hope of overcoming the Shadow that has haunted her. Thankfully, the Horse Master is bringing his whip.
author: Joely Sue Burkhart
